pricing_page.meta_description: VocalIA pricing plans: Free Widget, Starter at $99/mo, Pro at $299/mo, Custom Enterprise.
pricing_page.title: Transparent
pricing_page.subtitle: Start free with the Widget, scale to Enterprise as you grow.
pricing_page.free_desc: Perfect for testing VocalIA on your website with no commitment.
pricing_page.starter_desc: For SMBs looking to automate customer service.
pricing_page.pro_desc: For companies looking to maximize automation.
pricing_page.enterprise_desc: For large organizations with specific needs.
pricing_page.faq1_a: Each plan includes a certain number of telephony minutes. Beyond that, additional minutes are billed at $0.06/min. This rate includes telecom infrastructure and AI processing.
pricing_page.faq2_q: Can I change plans at any time?
pricing_page.faq2_a: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade at any time. Upgrades are immediate, downgrades take effect on the next billing cycle.
pricing_page.faq3_q: Is the Voice Widget really free?
pricing_page.faq3_a: Yes. The Widget uses the browser's native Web Speech API, which is free. VocalIA has no API cost to pass on to you. Only VocalIA branding is displayed on the free plan.
pricing_page.faq4_a: Darija is the Moroccan dialect spoken by 40 million speakers. VocalIA uses a specialized AI model, a specialized model, to offer native support.
pricing_page.faq5_q: How does the self-hosted option work?
pricing_page.faq5_a: For Enterprise clients, we provide Docker containers and deployment scripts to install VocalIA on your own infrastructure (VPS, private cloud, on-premise). You keep full control of your data.
pricing_page.cta_subtitle: Start free, scale when you're ready.
pricing_page.volume_subtitle: The more you use, the more you save

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Businesses like yours are transforming their customer service with VocalIA
testimonials.quote1: VocalIA reduced our response time from 3 hours to 30 seconds. Darija support made the difference for our Moroccan customers.
testimonials.quote2: Our patients can now book appointments 24/7. No-show rate dropped by 40% thanks to automatic reminders.
testimonials.quote3: The voice agent qualifies leads while we're on visits. Our conversion rate increased by 35% in 3 months.
testimonials.role3: Sales Director, Real Estate Agency • Marrakech

contact_page.title: Let's Talk About Your
contact_page.subtitle: Demo request, custom quote, or technical question — our team responds within 24h.
contact_page.form_privacy: I accept the privacy policy and data processing.
contact_page.faq1_a: You can try our Voice Widget for free directly on our site. For a complete Voice Telephony AI demo, contact us via this form.
contact_page.faq2_a: Voice Widget can be integrated in less than 5 minutes with a simple snippet. Voice Telephony AI typically takes 1 to 2 weeks depending on your project complexity.
contact_page.faq3_a: Absolutely! Our team is based in Morocco and communicates in French, English, and Arabic. Support is available 24/7 for Pro and Enterprise clients.

about_page.meta_title: About - VocalIA | Our Voice AI Mission
about_page.title: Revolutionizing
about_page.subtitle: VocalIA is a Moroccan startup democratizing access to AI voice agents. Our mission: enable every business to offer an exceptional voice customer experience at a fraction of traditional costs.
about_page.mission_p1: Traditional voice AI solutions cost between €0.15 and €0.33 per minute. We believe every business, regardless of size, deserves access to professional-quality AI voice agents.
about_page.mission_p2: That's why we developed VocalIA: a platform offering AI voice agents at €0.06/minute — 60% cheaper than competitors, without compromising quality.
about_page.value1_desc: We use the latest multi-provider AI technologies to deliver ever smarter and more natural voice agents.
about_page.value2_desc: Our mission is to make voice AI accessible to all businesses, from startups to enterprises, at a fair price.
about_page.value3_desc: World's first Darija (Moroccan dialect) support, with agents that truly understand local cultural nuances.
about_page.lang_subtitle: Our voice agents speak naturally in 5 languages, including Moroccan Darija — a world first in the Voice AI industry.
about_page.cta_title: Ready to Revolutionize Your Customer Service?
about_page.cta_subtitle: Join the businesses trusting VocalIA for their AI voice agents.

features_page.meta_description: Discover all VocalIA features: Free Voice Widget, AI Telephony, 40 business personas, 5 languages, CRM integrations and more.
features_page.title: All Platform

features_page.products_subtitle: Cover 100% of your voice communication channels
features_page.widget_desc: Integrate an intelligent voice assistant directly on your website. 2-minute installation, no cost.
features_page.widget_f1: Native Web Speech API ($0 API cost)
features_page.telephony_desc: Voice agents on real PSTN phone lines. Enterprise quality, <100ms latency.
features_page.telephony_f2: 5 languages: FR, EN, ES, AR, Darija
features_page.all_features_subtitle: Everything you need for enterprise-grade voice agents
features_page.feat_latency_desc: Responses in under 100ms thanks to our optimized AI + WebSocket architecture.
features_page.feat_languages_desc: French, English, Spanish, MSA Arabic and Moroccan Darija with automatic detection.
features_page.feat_personas_desc: Pre-configured agents: dentist, real estate, e-commerce, support, HR, finance, and more.
features_page.feat_fallback_desc: 5 levels of AI redundancy. 99.9% uptime guaranteed with automatic fallback.
features_page.feat_analytics_desc: Dashboard with metrics: call duration, sentiment, conversion rate, costs.
features_page.feat_tools_desc: Booking, CRM sync, order lookup, lead qualification, payment, transfer, and more.
features_page.feat_rag_desc: Vector knowledge base by sector. Precise contextual responses.
features_page.feat_hitl_desc: Human-in-the-loop for critical decisions: bookings, transfers, escalations.
features_page.feat_crm_desc: HubSpot, Klaviyo, Shopify, Calendly. Automatic bidirectional sync.

features_page.newsletter_desc: Get our Voice AI tips and product updates.

voice_widget_page.meta_title: Voice Widget - VocalIA | Free Voice Assistant
voice_widget_page.title: Voice Widget
voice_widget_page.subtitle: Integrate an intelligent AI voice assistant on your website in 2 minutes. Uses the browser's native Web Speech API:
voice_widget_page.widget_greeting: Hello! I'm your voice assistant. How can I help you?
voice_widget_page.widget_response: We're open Monday to Friday, 9am to 6pm. Would you like to schedule an appointment?
voice_widget_page.steps_subtitle: Deploy your voice assistant in under 2 minutes
voice_widget_page.step1_desc: Choose your persona, language and customize the design in the dashboard.
voice_widget_page.step2_desc: Get the automatically generated JavaScript snippet.
voice_widget_page.step3_desc: Add the script before the </body> tag of your site.
voice_widget_page.feature1_desc: Native browser speech recognition and synthesis. No external API, $0 cost.
voice_widget_page.feature2_desc: Pre-configured agents: dentist, real estate, e-commerce, support, HR, and more.
voice_widget_page.feature3_desc: French, English, Spanish, Arabic MSA and Moroccan Darija with auto-detection.
voice_widget_page.feature4_desc: Colors, position, avatar and style adapted to your brand guidelines.
voice_widget_page.feature5_desc: Dashboard with sessions, durations, frequent questions and resolution rate.
voice_widget_page.feature6_desc: Interface automatically adapted to smartphones and tablets.
voice_widget_page.specs_subtitle: For developers who want to know everything
voice_widget_page.specs_security_data: No data stored on VocalIA side
voice_widget_page.cta_title: Ready to Add a Voice Assistant?
voice_widget_page.cta_subtitle: Free, no credit card, deployed in 2 minutes.

industries_healthcare_page.meta_description: HIPAA, GDPR Health and HDS compliant voice AI solutions for medical offices, clinics and hospitals.
industries_healthcare_page.hero_subtitle: Automate appointment management, reduce no-shows by 60%, and offer 24/7 patient reception with AI compliant with health standards.
industries_healthcare_page.challenge1_desc: 25% of medical appointments are missed, generating financial losses and disrupting schedules.
industries_healthcare_page.challenge2_desc: Administrative staff spends 60% of their time on the phone instead of welcoming patients.
industries_healthcare_page.challenge3_desc: Patients can only call during business hours, creating frustration and missed calls.
industries_healthcare_page.challenge4_desc: Collecting pre-consultation information is time-consuming and error-prone.
industries_healthcare_page.challenge5_desc: Post-procedure follow-up is often insufficient due to lack of resources.
industries_healthcare_page.challenge6_desc: HIPAA, GDPR Health and HDS standards require enhanced patient data security.

industries_healthcare_page.solution1_desc: Calendar sync, multi-practitioner management, emergency slots.
industries_healthcare_page.solution2_desc: 60% reduction in no-shows through personalized voice reminders.
industries_healthcare_page.solution3_desc: Automatic collection of symptoms and medical history before consultation.
industries_healthcare_page.solution4_desc: Automated follow-up calls with anomaly detection and practitioner alerts.
industries_healthcare_page.compliance_hipaa_desc: Compliant with US health data protection requirements.
industries_healthcare_page.compliance_rgpd_desc: Data hosted in Europe, explicit consent, right to be forgotten.
industries_healthcare_page.compliance_hds_desc: Compatible with Health Data Hosting requirements.
industries_healthcare_page.cta_subtitle: Request a personalized demo with our Healthcare persona.

usecases_ecommerce_page.problems_subtitle: Les équipes support sont submergées par des questions répétitives
usecases_ecommerce_page.problem_wait_desc: Les clients attendent en moyenne 12 heures pour une réponse email, causant frustration et abandon de panier.

usecases_ecommerce_page.solution_escalation_desc: Transfert automatique vers un agent humain pour les cas complexes.
usecases_ecommerce_page.solution_multilingual_desc: Support en FR, EN, ES, AR et Darija pour servir tous vos marchés.

usecases_support_page.meta_description: Automate your customer service with voice AI. 24/7 support, multilingual, integrated with your tools.
usecases_support_page.hero_subtitle: Deliver exceptional customer support with AI voice agents that respond instantly, in 5 languages, with no wait time.
usecases_support_page.challenge1_desc: Customers wait an average of 10 minutes before getting an agent, generating frustration and abandonment.
usecases_support_page.challenge2_desc: Peak periods (sales, holidays) overwhelm teams and degrade quality.
usecases_support_page.challenge3_desc: Turnover in call centers exceeds 30%, causing recruitment and training costs.
usecases_support_page.solutions_subtitle: A voice AI assistant that handles tier 1 support
usecases_support_page.solution2_desc: Smooth transfer to human agent when needed with full context.
usecases_support_page.solution3_desc: Support in French, English, Spanish, Arabic and Moroccan Darija.
usecases_support_page.solution4_desc: Real-time dashboard with satisfaction and performance metrics.
usecases_support_page.cta_title: Ready to transform your customer service?
usecases_support_page.cta_subtitle: Join companies delivering exceptional support without breaking the budget.
usecases_support_page.problems_title: Les défis du service client moderne
usecases_support_page.problems_subtitle: Les attentes clients augmentent, les ressources restent limitées
usecases_support_page.problem_wait_desc: Les clients s'attendent à une réponse en moins de 5 minutes. La moyenne actuelle: 12-24h par email, 10min par téléphone.
usecases_support_page.problem_costs_desc: Chaque agent coûte 35-50K€/an. Pour un support 24/7 multilingue, comptez 10+ agents minimum.
usecases_support_page.problem_quality_desc: La qualité varie selon l'agent, son humeur, sa formation. Impossible de garantir une expérience uniforme.
usecases_support_page.features_subtitle: VocalIA combine IA conversationnelle et expertise métier pour un support irréprochable
usecases_support_page.feature_conversations_desc: IA entraînée sur des millions de conversations support. Comprend le contexte, les nuances et les émotions.
usecases_support_page.feature_kb_desc: Synchronisation automatique avec votre documentation, FAQ, et historique tickets pour des réponses toujours à jour.
usecases_support_page.feature_escalation_desc: Détection automatique des cas complexes ou clients VIP. Transfert fluide vers agent humain avec contexte complet.
usecases_support_page.feature_analytics_desc: Dashboard avec métriques clés: volume, résolution, satisfaction, tendances. Insights actionables automatiques.
usecases_support_page.feature_languages_desc: Français, Anglais, Espagnol, Arabe standard et Darija marocain. Détection automatique de la langue du client.
usecases_support_page.feature_crm_desc: Native connection with HubSpot, Zendesk, Freshdesk. Bidirectional customer data synchronization.
usecases_support_page.workflow_step1_desc: Importez votre FAQ, documentation produit et historique de tickets. L'IA apprend votre métier en 24h.
usecases_support_page.workflow_step2_desc: Choisissez parmi 40 personas métier ou créez le vôtre. Définissez le ton, les règles d'escalade.
usecases_support_page.workflow_step3_desc: Widget web ou téléphonie. Suivez les performances en temps réel et affinez continuellement.

usecases_leads_page.meta_description: Automatically qualify your leads with the BANT framework. Real-time scoring, CRM sync, alerts.
usecases_leads_page.hero_subtitle: Automatically qualify your prospects with the BANT framework. Real-time scoring, CRM synchronization, sales alerts.
usecases_leads_page.challenges_subtitle: Too many unqualified leads waste sales team time
usecases_leads_page.challenge1_desc: 80% of incoming leads don't match the ideal customer profile, wasting time.
usecases_leads_page.challenge2_desc: Average lead response time is 47 hours, when 78% buy from the first responder.
usecases_leads_page.challenge3_desc: Sales reps spend 40% of their time on qualification tasks instead of selling.
usecases_leads_page.bant_budget_desc: Does the prospect have the budget for your solution? The AI detects buying signals and investment capacity.
usecases_leads_page.bant_authority_desc: Is the contact a decision-maker or influencer? The AI identifies their role in the buying process.
usecases_leads_page.bant_need_desc: Is the need real and urgent? The AI evaluates business pain points and fit with your offering.
usecases_leads_page.bant_timeline_desc: When does the prospect plan to decide? The AI determines urgency and project deadlines.
usecases_leads_page.solutions_subtitle: A voice assistant that qualifies your leads automatically
usecases_leads_page.solution1_desc: Automatic questions to assess Budget, Authority, Need and Timeline.
usecases_leads_page.solution2_desc: Qualification score automatically calculated after each conversation.
usecases_leads_page.solution3_desc: Qualification data automatically sent to your CRM.
usecases_leads_page.solution4_desc: Immediate notification to sales reps for hot leads.
usecases_leads_page.cta_title: Ready to qualify your leads automatically?
usecases_leads_page.cta_subtitle: Request a demo with the BANT framework.
usecases_leads_page.score_title: Score de qualification en temps réel
usecases_leads_page.score_desc: À la fin de chaque conversation, VocalIA génère un score BANT complet et une recommandation d'action.
usecases_leads_page.score_hot: Hot lead - Transfert immédiat au commercial
usecases_leads_page.feature_adaptive_desc: Les questions s'adaptent en temps réel selon les réponses. Conversation naturelle, pas interrogatoire.
usecases_leads_page.feature_transfer_desc: Lead qualifié? Transfert instantané au commercial disponible avec briefing contextuel complet.
usecases_leads_page.feature_crm_desc: Score and enriched data automatically synced with HubSpot and Pipedrive.
usecases_leads_page.feature_alerts_desc: Notification Slack/email immédiate pour chaque hot lead. Ne laissez plus refroidir vos prospects.
usecases_leads_page.feature_analytics_desc: Visualisez votre funnel, identifiez les goulots d'étranglement, optimisez votre processus de vente.
usecases_leads_page.feature_objections_desc: L'IA traite les objections courantes et relance les leads hésitants avec les bons arguments.
